data.question: What is the empirical formula of the [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
data.answer: C84 H140 F15 N4 O31 P5 Pt2 S3

data.question: What type of crystal system does [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf belong to?
What is the space group of the [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf crystal?
What are the unit cell dimensions of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
What is the final R index (I>2sigma(I)) for the refinement of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
Is the crystal system of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf monoclinic?
Does the [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf have a space group of P-21/c?
data.answer: False, its space group is P-1.

data.question: Is the empirical formula of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf C84 H140 F15 N4 O31 P5 Pt2 S3?
What is the density (calculated) of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
What is the maximum and minimum transmission for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
data.answer: Max. transmission is 0.5565 and min. transmission is 0.4359

data.question: Is the absorption correction for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf done using a multi-scan method?
data.answer: False, it was done using a semi-empirical method from equivalents.

data.question: What is the extinction coefficient for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
What are the angles (α, β, γ) for the unit cell of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
Is the crystal size of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf 0.30 x 0.30 x 0.20 mm3?
What is the volume of the unit cell for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
Does the [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf have a Z value of 4?
What is the largest difference peak and hole for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
data.answer: Largest diff. peak is 3.153 and hole is -1.676 e.Å-3

data.question: Is the refinement method for [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf based on F2?
What is the goodness-of-fit on F2 for the refinement of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf?
Are the R indices for all data of [3]catenane 5a•4PF6•4OTf R1 = 0.1247 and wR2 = 0.3672?
